properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PATH || NEW_NAME AS "TITLE_IMG", C.POST_NO, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NIC, CREATE_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE POST_NO = C.POST_NO) AS "LIKE_COUNT", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO=8 AND POST_NO = C.POST_NO) AS "REPLY_COUNT" FROM CAMP_GRAM C JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON A.POST_NO = C.POST_NO JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE $ LIKE ? AND M.STATUS = 'N' AND C.STATUS = 'N' AND A.STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC, POST_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM CAMP_GRAM WHERE STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE CAMP_GRAM SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT + 1 WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
SELECT PHOTO_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE STATUS = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = 8 AND POST_NO = ?
SELECT POST_NO, MEMBER_NO FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE POST_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO CAMP_GRAM ( BOARD_NO, POST_NO, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( 8, SEQ_STARNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (PHOTO_NO, BOARD_NO, POST_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, 8, SEQ_STARNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT (PHOTO_NO, BOARD_NO, POST_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, NEW_NAME, PATH) VALUES (SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, 8, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE CAMP_GRAM SET POST_CONTENT = ? WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'N'
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? , NEW_NAME = ? , PATH = ? , UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_NO = 8 AND POST_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = 8 AND POST_NO = ?
UPDATE CAMP_GRAM SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE POST_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE BOARD_NO = 8 AND POST_NO = ?
DELETE BOARD_LIKE WHERE POST_NO = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT PATH || NEW_NAME AS "TITLE_IMG", POST_NO, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NIC, CREATE_DATE FROM CAMP_GRAM C JOIN ATTACHMENT A USING(POST_NO) JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY READ_COUNT DESC

SELECT (SELECT PATH || NEW_NAME FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE POST_NO = ? AND BOARD_NO = 8 AND STATUS = 'N') AS "TITLE_IMG" , POST_NO, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NIC, CREATE_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_LIKE WHERE POST_NO = ?) AS "LIKE_COUNT", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO=8 AND POST_NO = ?) AS "REPLY_COUNT" FROM CAMP_GRAM C JOIN MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT USING(POST_NO) WHERE POST_NO = ? AND M.STATUS = 'N' AND C.STATUS = 'N'
INSERT INTO REPLY(REPLY_NO,BOARD_NO ,REPLY_CONTENT, POST_NO, WRITER) VALUES(SEQ_PLYNO.NEXTVAL, 8, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, MEMBER_NIC, TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS')CREATE_DATE FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER ON (WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = 8 AND POST_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC , REPLY_NO DESC
